               +-----------------------------------------+              
                                                                        
                         Encoder/Ripper: SMiLE                         
                                                                        
   Source wasn't the best for a DVDSCR but it was good enough. We       
   took the .mkv and loaded it in for converting. There we added a      
   few little filters before then running our custom encode settings,   
   we kept the res pretty low as we don't think this benefits from      
   a bigger one. It turned out very nice. Some groups have doubled      
   the file-size of the source, to get a higher bitrate. This can       
   in some cases cause even more quality damage to the file. We         
   decided to push-up the file size to 500mb, getting a much better     
   bitrate without dropping loads of quality. We've tagged the release  
   year to be (2012) - Amazon says that the Bluray/DVD is out around    
   the 26-28th of December, but IMDB says (2012). Either way there is   
   only a few days between the two years. The audio and video on this   
   will crackle and black out for a few seconds every now and again,    
   but that's the way the movie is and the way it was intended to       
   be seen. Last thing to say is - Enjoy!                              
                                                                        
                           +-------------------+
